TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XsdDataContractImporter extends System.Object

summary.span: 用于将一组 XML 架构文件 (.xsd) 转换为公共语言运行库 (CLR) 类型。

span.span: Allows the transformation of a set of XML schema files (.xsd) into common language runtime (CLR) types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果所创建的 Web 服务必须与现有 Web 服务交互操作，或者要从 XML 架构创建数据协定类型，请使用 。Use the if you are creating a Web service that must interoperate with an existing Web service, or to create data contract types from XML schemas. 能够转换一组 XML 架构，并且创建用所选编程语言表示数据协定的 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 类型。 will transform a set of XML schemas and create the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] types that represent the data contract in a selected programming language. 若要创建代码，请使用 命名空间中的类。To create the code, use the classes in the namespace. 反过来，在已创建的 Web 服务包含由 CLR 类型表示的数据时，以及在需要为其他 Web 服务将使用的每个数据类型导出 XML 架构时，请使用 类。Conversely, use the class when you have created a Web service that incorporates data represented by CLR types and when you need to export XML schemas for each data type to be consumed by other Web services. 也就是说， 能够将一组 CLR 类型转换成一组 XML 架构。That is, transforms a set of CLR types into a set of XML schemas. > [!NOTE] > 若要从 XML 架构生成 CLR 类型，在设计时，使用[ServiceModel Metadata Utility Tool (Svcutil.exe)](~/docs/framework/wcf/servicemodel-metadata-utility-tool-svcutil-exe.md)。To generate CLR types from XML schemas at design time, use the [ServiceModel Metadata Utility Tool (Svcutil.exe)](~/docs/framework/wcf/servicemodel-metadata-utility-tool-svcutil-exe.md). 若要从 XSD 文件生成代码，使用`/dataContractOnly`工具的开关。To generated code from XSD files, use the `/dataContractOnly` switch of the tool. 此外，如果需要对进程进行更多控制或者需要以编程方式执行此操作，还可以使用 。You can also use the if you need more control over the process or need to do it programmatically. ## Examples 下面的示例创建了一个 ，并调用 方法来创建一个 。The following example creates an and calls the method to create a . 然后，使用 来创建 Visual C# 和 Visual Basic 代码文件。The is then used to create both Visual C# and Visual Basic code files. [!code-csharp[XsdDataContractImporter#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/xsddatacontractimporter/cs/xsddatacontractimporterexample.cs#0)] [!code-vb[XsdDataContractImporter#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/xsddatacontractimporter/vb/xsddatacontractimporterexample.vb#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference GetCodeTypeReference (System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName typeName, System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement element);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference GetCodeTypeReference(class System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName typeName, class System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement element) cil managed
Public Function GetCodeTypeReference (typeName As XmlQualifiedName, element As XmlSchemaElement) As CodeTypeReference

param.name: typeName
param.span: 一个 ，它指定要查找的架构类型的 XML 限定名称。

span.span: An that specifies the XML qualified name of the schema type to look up.

param.name: element
param.span: 一个 ，它指定 XML 架构中的元素。

span.span: An that specifies an element in an XML schema.

summary.span: 返回指定的 XML 限定元素和架构元素的 。

span.span: Returns a for the specified XML qualified element and schema element.

returns.span: 一个 ，它表示为指定的架构类型生成的类型。

span.span: A that represents the type that was generated for the specified schema type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于有关在元素范围指定的类型的数据，需要使用架构元素。The schema element is needed for data about the type that is specified at the element scope. 这些数据的一个主要示例是 XSD 属性 `nillable`。The main example of this is the XSD attribute `nillable`. 在架构中，将 `nillable` 设置为 `true` 是在包含架构元素上指定的，而 null 的概念则是在 CLR 类型 中表示的。In schema, setting `nillable` to `true` is specified on the containing schema element whereas the concept of null is expressed in the CLR type . 传入该元素的目的是使此导入程序可以查找元素级信息并相应地返回正确的类型引用。The element is passed in so that this importer can look up the element-level information and return the correct type reference accordingly. 导入 WSDL 时，每个参数都会分别导入，因此需要分别传入参数元素。When importing WSDL, each parameter is imported separately and therefore the parameter elements need to be passed in separately.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<class System.CodeDom.CodeTypeReference> GetKnownTypeReferences(class System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName typeName) cil managed
Public Function GetKnownTypeReferences (typeName As XmlQualifiedName) As ICollection(Of CodeTypeReference)

param.name: typeName
param.span: 一个 ，它表示要为其查找已知类型的架构类型。

span.span: An that represents the schema type to look up known types for.

summary.span: 返回一个 对象列表，这些对象表示在为指定架构类型生成代码时生成的已知类型。

span.span: Returns a list of objects that represents the known types generated when generating code for the specified schema type.
A of type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在为架构类型生成 CLR 类型时，还会为存在于架构中的所有派生类型生成已知类型。When generating CLR types for schema types, known types are also generated for all derived types that are present in the schema. 在许多情况下，使用属性将这些已知类型添加到生成的代码中。In many cases, these known types are added using attributes to the generated code. (有关示例，请参阅类。(For example, see the class. ） 但是，对于顶级类型，需要那里一种方法来返回生成的已知类型的集。) However, for the top-level type, there needs to be a way to return the set of known types generated. 此方法返回为特定架构类型生成的已知类型的 。This method returns the for known types that were generated for a specific schema type. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Data Contract Known Types](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-contract-known-types.md)。For more information, see [Data Contract Known Types](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-contract-known-types.md).

span.span: Data Contract Known Types

summary.span: 将一组 XML 架构转换为用于生成 CLR 代码的 。

span.span: Transforms a set of XML schemas into a used to generate CLR code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类自定义在架构导入期间生成 CLR 类型的方式。Use the class to customize how the CLR types are generated during schema import.
